A World Class Forum - Celebrate Technology in Las Vegas
The future of technology has never looked brighter, and it's changing everybody's lives for the better. IBM Interconnect is back! This March, technology will take over Las Vegas for 4 exhilarating days of expert talks, guest speakers and partying. With over 20,000+ attendees expected, this is a technology event that you do not want to miss. From Cognitive technologies to Hybrid Cloud, Internet of Things to Enterprise Integration. You cannot miss Interconnect!

Who We Are!
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is an IBM Premier Business Partner and a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan. With over 23 years of industry experience, Miracle and its team of 2500 employees has been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers globally to achieve their business goals through technology.
  Cloud Application Migration
  Quality Assurance Services
  Enterprise Mobility Services
  Cognitive Computing
  DevOps and Automation

  Hybrid Integration and API M
  Big Data and Analytics
